授業目的: I am always happy to meet students during my office hours to discuss their academic needs and concerns, for example by offering advice on the interpretation of a literary text, providing a reference for study abroad, or by studying a text together.
到達目標: Objectives will be agreed at the beginning of the learning period.
授業方法: Individual sessions for reading and discussion in my office.

トピック.授業計画1: A programme of study and instruction will be arranged according to student requirements.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.

name: 【750】特別研究　Ｆ６／Complimentary Seminar
